name: Untitled Aquarium Game
description:
A little game I made because I felt like it.

You sit back and witness fish evolve and adapt to newer generations.

CONTROLS
  • Press R to restart
  • Press ESC to open the menu
  • Click on a fish to view it
  • Hover over the "Family" and "Specialty" options on the fish UI to view more info about them
Notes

the headband goes to the fastest fish, and the tophat goes to the oldest
